effect_entries.effect: Teaches Shock Wave to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Sludge Wave to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Shock Wave Gen II: Swagger Gen I: Bide)

flavor_text_entries.text:
ヘドロの　波で　自分の　周りに
いるものを　攻撃する。
毒状態に　することが　ある。

The user strikes everything around it by
swamping the area with a giant sludge wave.
This may also poison those hit.

Lancia un’onda di fango che attacca tutti
i Pokémon nelle vicinanze. Può anche avvelenarli.

Alas macizas que golpean al objetivo y pueden
subir la Defensa del usuario.

Greift Pokémon in der Nähe des Anwenders mit
einer Schlammwelle an. Diese werden eventuell
vergiftet.

Une vague de détritus attaque tous les Pokémon
autour du lanceur. Peut aussi empoisonner.

오물의 파장으로 자신의 주위에
있는 포켓몬을 공격한다.
독 상태로 만들기도 한다.

ヘドロの　なみで　じぶんの　まわりに
いるものを　こうげきする。
どくに　することが　ある。

It swamps the area around the user
with a giant sludge wave.
It may also poison those hit.

It swamps the area around the user
with a giant sludge wave.
It may also poison those hit.

Attaque tout ce qui se trouve autour
avec une vague de crasse. Peut aussi
empoisonner.

The user strikes the foe with a quick
jolt of electricity. This attack cannot
be evaded.

The user strikes the foe with a quick
jolt of electricity. This attack cannot
be evaded.

The user strikes the foe with a quick
jolt of electricity. This attack cannot
be evaded.

A rapid jolt of
electricity strikes
the foe. It can’t
be evaded.

Zaps the foe with a
jolt of electricity
that never misses.

Zaps the foe with a
jolt of electricity
that never misses.
